title: Check Out MEMORRHAGE, FLAGMAN & More Covering Nü-Metal Classics
description: Plus 15 original songs, which is very cool.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 8 hours ago
excerpt: Plus 15 original songs, which is very cool.
text: Nu Metal Agenda Worldwide is now streaming their compilation, A Christmas F*cking Miracle: 15 Covers And 15 Originals By The New Wave Of Nu Metal. The compilation finds nü-metal newcomes like Klokwise, Memorrhage, and Flagman covering classics from bands like Limp Bizkit, Deftones, Korn, and way more! The compilation also features 15 originals from each of those bands, which is a very cool idea – introduce people to something new alongside the covers. Check it out below and get the full compilation here. The covers are: Klokwise – "Break Stuff" (Limp Bizkit cover) DGMA – "My Own Summer (Shove It)" (Deftones cover) Memorrhage – "Edgecrusher" (Fear Factory cover) Pulses. – "Lapdance" (N.E.R.D. cover) Flagman – "36" (System Of A Down cover) GREED WORM – "Lies" (Korn cover) Emotional Xan – "Helmet In The Bush" (Korn cover) Cheem – "Loco" (311 cover) 4 Degrees – "Joyride" (Snot cover) MC Taya – "Ratamahatta" (Sepultura cover) (feat. Isotopxs) DARLOTODO – "One Step Closer" (Linkin Park cover) Ghosts of Hope – "Toxicity" (System Of A Down cover) Null Split – "Blue Skin" (Nothingface cover) In 2 Again – "Pardon Me" (Incubus cover) Thirty Nights – "Closure" (Chevelle cover) Want More Metal? html:
Nu Metal Agenda Worldwide is now streaming their compilation, A Christmas F*cking Miracle: 15 Covers And 15 Originals By The New Wave Of Nu Metal. The compilation finds nü-metal newcomes like Klokwise, Memorrhage, and Flagman covering classics from bands like Limp Bizkit, Deftones, Korn, and way more! The compilation also features 15 originals from each of those bands, which is a very cool idea – introduce people to something new alongside the covers.

Check it out below and get the full compilation here. The covers are:

  1. Klokwise – "Break Stuff" (Limp Bizkit cover)
  2. DGMA – "My Own Summer (Shove It)" (Deftones cover)
  3. Memorrhage – "Edgecrusher" (Fear Factory cover)
  4. Pulses. – "Lapdance" (N.E.R.D. cover)
  5. Flagman – "36" (System Of A Down cover)
  6. GREED WORM – "Lies" (Korn cover)
  7. Emotional Xan – "Helmet In The Bush" (Korn cover)
  8. Cheem – "Loco" (311 cover)
  9. 4 Degrees – "Joyride" (Snot cover)
  10. MC Taya – "Ratamahatta" (Sepultura cover) (feat. Isotopxs)
  11. DARLOTODO – "One Step Closer" (Linkin Park cover)
  12. Ghosts of Hope – "Toxicity" (System Of A Down cover)
  13. Null Split – "Blue Skin" (Nothingface cover)
  14. In 2 Again – "Pardon Me" (Incubus cover)
  15. Thirty Nights – "Closure" (Chevelle cover)
